Package main

Class Game_Controller

java.lang.Object
main.Game_Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Game_Controller extends Object implements Runnable
The Game_Controller class is the central control unit for the game logics, responsible for managing game elements, handling user input, and controlling the game loop.
